text: whole-grain pasta main course is one of
my go-to meals it's super easy super
convenient but I'm always looking for
new ways to include more vegetables this
beet pasta solves all the problems add
12 ounces of farro to generously
seasoned boiling water salty like the C
give it a quick spin I cook this until
it's al dente I'm going to set my timer
for about nine minutes while the pastas
cooking I'm going to prepare my
delicious beet mixture it's kind of like
a pesto I've roasted three medium-sized
beets this is about a pound until
they're nice and tender cooled peeled
off the skins chop them up
so pulse this a few times color is
already looking lovely looks great
to that add 1/2 cup of toasted walnuts
the walnuts are going to add a really
nice crunch they're also going to add
nice heart-healthy fats and one
tablespoon chopped sun-dried tomatoes
this I think is the secret weapon it
adds a really nice tangy rich tomato
flavor love sun-dried tomatoes sun-dried
tomatoes are a really excellent source
of lycopene
to this at 1/4 cup olive oil such a
lovely color
and season with salt and red pepper
flakes looks wonderful we'll just wait
for our pasta to finish boiling we'll
combine everything so the bus is Dre
left a little bit of water on it for the
noodles
it'll help clean with the beet sauce add
the beet mixture to the hot pasta use
some of your reserved pasta water here
just to loosen up the sauce of it start
conservatively you can always add more
this really smells amazing the nuttiness
of the farro the earthiness of the beets
can't wait to try this another great
thing about using Faro pasta is that
it's one of the ancient grain so it
actually has more protein and dietary
fiber than conventional wheat pasta so
if you see for our pasta in your grocery

touch a nice dollop of ricotta cheese

and dinner is served can't wait to try
this
